name: 邱瓊玲
objective: 本課程主要針對已具備初級會計學基礎之同學，在國際財務報導準則 (IFRS) 的基準下，來進一步探討財務會計。主題包括財務報導觀念性架構、貨幣時間價值、資產、負債及權益之相關會計理論及方法，同時也培養學生的批判性思考能力。
schedule:
1. The Environment and Conceptual Framework of Financial Reporting
2. The Environment and Conceptual Framework of Financial Reporting
3. Accounting and the Time Value of Money
4. Cash and Receivables
5. National Day
6. Cash and Receivables
7. Inventories
8. Inventories
9. Midterm Exam
10. Acquisition and Disposition of Property, Plant, and Equipment
11. Depreciation, Impairments, and Depletion
12. Depreciation, Impairments, and Depletion
13. Intangible Assets
14. Intangible Assets
15. Liabilities, Provisions, and Contingencies
16. Liabilities, Provisions, and Contingencies
17. Liabilities, Provisions, and Contingencies
18. Final Exam
scorePolicy:
平時成績 20%
期中考 40%
期末考 40%
materials: Intermediate Accounting: IFRS Edition, 5th Edition,2025, by Donald E. Kieso, Jerry J. Weygandt, and Terry D. Warfield. (Wiley)
